OMFG all you ass hole got to do is this.

1. go to Control Panel

2. look for View By press and choose Large Icon

3.go to Folder Options

4.press View then look for a folder call hidden files and folders then click show hidden files then click apply then ok.

5.then go to C\/Users\(user name)\appdata\local\electronic arts or EA Game or where ever you install it at there you will see dead space then settings its a text document.

6. click settings look for Game.Played = 0 then put this under that Locale = en then save and its in english now.
